definition: to miss/to yearn day and night
soul/spirit/immortal soul, i.e. that can be detached from the body
to lead along/to pull (an animal on a tether)/(bound form) to involve/to draw in
dream/CL:場|场[chang2],個|个[ge4]/(bound form) to dream
wind around

sentences.english: He didn't pray for Catherine's soul to haunt him.
sentences.chinese: 他也不祈求凱瑟琳的魂牽夢縈。

sentences.english: This life, this love that you and I have been dreaming of, for so long.
sentences.chinese: 這場人生，這份感情，讓你我長久爲之魂牽夢縈。

sentences.english: Dreams, cycle of three thousand years, at the world stage.
sentences.chinese: 魂牽夢縈，三千年的輪迴，於今世上演。

sentences.english: Military hero of heart, beloved daughter.
sentences.chinese: 關山戎馬英雄心，魂牽夢縈女兒情。

sentences.english: One of the big appeals of a dream job is dreaming about it.
sentences.chinese: 理想事業的一大誘人之處在於你會爲之魂牽夢縈。

sentences.english: Historical and cultural homeland, you are so colorful, so that .
sentences.chinese: 祖國的歷史文化，你是這樣多姿多彩，令魂牽夢縈。
